body_html:
K.get_session().run(tf.initialize_local_variables().run())

Gives me
builtins.ValueError: Cannot execute operation using run(): No default session is registered. Use with sess.as_default(): or pass an explicit session to run(session=sess)

body:
K.get_session().run(tf.initialize_local_variables().run())

Gives me
builtins.ValueError: Cannot execute operation using `run()`: No default session is registered. Use `with sess.as_default():` or pass an explicit session to `run(session=sess)`
